text: David T. Bradley (November 13, 1952 â€“ February 19, 2022) was an American Democratic politician. He was a member of the Arizona Senate from 2013 to 2021. He was a member of the Arizona House of Representatives from 2003 to 2011. Bradley was born in Seattle, Washington. Bradley died from cancer in California on February 19, 2022, at the age of 69. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in California Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Tucson, Arizona Category:Politicians from Seattle Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: David Bradley (politician)
